item.title: By: velda
item.dc:creator: velda
item.description: Sweet. Sheri and I wondered out loud last time we saw you "Where is he reading all this cool stuff?" -- and now we shall have answers. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Sweet. Sheri and I wondered out loud last time we saw you “Where is he reading all this cool stuff?” — and now we shall have answers. Thanks!

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/02/16/recommended-reading-steve-souders-high-performance-web-sites/#comment-3190">Peter Anselmo</a>.
Excellent! It's a great feeling when you're able to improve the performance of a site.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Peter Anselmo.

Excellent! It’s a great feeling when you’re able to improve the performance of a site.

item.title: By: Peter Anselmo
item.dc:creator: Peter Anselmo
item.description: Agreed. I was at the 2009 SF WordCamp, and his talk stood out as being extremely useful. I wish he would have had a little more time, I think his hour went by too fast. I've paired his stuff with what I learned from your optimization talk at the Reno Wordcamp; I've been able to significantly speed up a number of my sites.
item.content:encoded: Agreed. I was at the 2009 SF WordCamp, and his talk stood out as being extremely useful. I wish he would have had a little more time, I think his hour went by too fast. I’ve paired his stuff with what I learned from your optimization talk at the Reno Wordcamp; I’ve been able to significantly speed up a number of my sites.
